description:
Biggest change is reworking the entire song to be 4/4 with a shuffle (know the difference! If you're using a lot of dotted quarters or quarter-eighth patterns in 6/8 or 12/8 it's probably 4/4 with swing/shuffle)

- Positionings for things have been changed to make more sense, as well as be more accurate to what's seen in live recordings (incomplete; biggest changes in the bridge/outro)
- Some tracks have been merged. May not be permanent, I'll take a closer look at the song some other time and see what should be done
- Added lead sheet symbols pretty much everywhere they're needed
- Correrctions to drums here and there, as well as a few other tracks. Still needs work
title: Spring and a Storm

description: Added repeats to the beginning guitar line. Plus rain.
title: Spring and a Storm

description: Same as below, added acoustic part at the very end
title: Spring and a Storm
